attributes.action: Government to consider Families  minimum income visa rules of £18600.
attributes.additional_details: Children are either separated from one parent or forced to grow up outside the UK because of the rules.  We need to go back to the policy and consider the impact that this is having on  British children and their families.
attributes.background: British citizens in full-time employment on the minimum wage cannot enjoy the right to live with their families in the UK.
